description:
With summer approaching, the girls decide to go shopping for swimsuits. As the weather is still too cold to go to the beach, the girls decide to show off their new suits at the mall`s rooftop pool.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kouhai to Mizu ga Torori to Haru no Kaze
The Viscous Water and Gently Blowing Springtime Zephyrs with Kouhai
後輩と 水がとろりと 春の風
